hero.title: NeuroCare
hero.subtitle: Understand yourself. Connect deeply.
hero.mindUnique: Your mind is unique. Let's explore it.

testSection.title: Choose Your Journey
testSection.description: Each test reveals different aspects of your personality. Start with MBTI and unlock deeper insights about yourself.

mbti.title: MBTI
mbti.description: Discover your personality through AI precision. Understand your cognitive preferences and how you interact with the world.

bigFive.title: Big Five
bigFive.description: Explore the five fundamental dimensions of personality that shape who you are.

enneagram.title: Enneagram
enneagram.description: Uncover your core motivations and fears through this ancient wisdom system.

eq.title: Emotional Intelligence
eq.description: Measure your ability to understand and manage emotions effectively.

questions.1: I prefer quiet time alone to recharge rather than social gatherings.
questions.2: I find it easy to start conversations with strangers.
questions.3: I often think before I speak.
questions.4: I enjoy being the center of attention.
questions.5: I prefer deep conversations over small talk.
questions.6: I trust facts and details more than theories and ideas.
questions.7: I often think about future possibilities more than present realities.
questions.8: I prefer practical tasks to imaginative brainstorming.
questions.9: I enjoy abstract concepts and symbolism.
questions.10: I focus on what is happening now rather than what might happen later.
questions.11: I make decisions based on logic rather than emotions.
questions.12: I value harmony and try to avoid conflict.
questions.13: I can be very objective, even if it hurts someone's feelings.
questions.14: I consider others' feelings when making decisions.
questions.15: I believe truth is more important than tact.
questions.16: I like to have a plan rather than be spontaneous.
questions.17: I prefer to keep my options open as long as possible.
questions.18: I like to finish tasks well before the deadline.
questions.19: I adapt easily to changes in plans.
questions.20: I feel uncomfortable when things are unorganized.
questions.21: I enjoy solving complex problems more than socializing.
questions.22: I trust my gut feelings more than logical analysis.
questions.23: I am usually punctual and value schedules.
questions.24: I like exploring new ideas, even if they seem impractical.
questions.25: I prefer to work in a structured environment.
questions.26: I often put others' needs before my own.
questions.27: I enjoy debating ideas to find the best answer.
questions.28: I feel energized after spending time with friends.
questions.29: I often reflect on my emotions deeply.
questions.30: I prefer to keep things flexible and open-ended.
